programme.title: A Cidade dos Anjos
programme.desc: Seth, um anjo recém-chegado à Terra, preocupa-se exageradamente com as questões humanas e acaba por entrar numa relação amorosa com uma cirurgiã especializada em doenças cardíacas. Entre ambos surge uma paixão impossível, o que leva a que ambos desafiem as leis que definem a sua existência.

programme.title: O Sorriso de Mona Lisa
programme.desc: Em 1953, uma professora de História da Arte num colégio para raparigas tenta alargar os estreitos horizontes das suas brilhantes alunas. O maior desafio será fazer com que as estudantes encontrem (e assumam) a sua identidade cultural, partindo da visão ampla e desafiante dos novos conhecimentos.

programme.title: Her Smell - A Música Nas Veias
programme.desc: Uma cantora de punk rock autodestrutiva luta por se manter sóbria, enquanto tenta recuperar a inspiração e a criatividade que catapultou a sua banda para o sucesso.

programme.title: Encurralado
programme.desc: Buddy é um jovem pai acusado de um crime, que para tentar provar a sua inocência terá de contar a um oficial da polícia tudo o que sabe sobre os arrepiantes factos da noite anterior, que envolvem a sedução por uma mulher mais velha e o convite pelo alcoólico marido desta para a matar.

programme.title: O Jantar
programme.desc: Dois casais reúnem-se num restaurante de luxo para decidir o que fazer em relação a um crime que os filhos de ambos cometeram: deixá-los sofrer as consequências e passar por um sistema penal que os marcará para sempre ou fechar os olhos e validar um comportamento inaceitável?

programme.title: Snow: O Espelho da Rainha (V.P.)
programme.desc: A Rainha da Neve está de volta e desta vez vai fazer com que o feitiço se vire contra o feiticeiro. Kiara, Kai, Luta e Orm têm um grande desafio pela frente. Será que a amizade que os une vai ser forte o suficiente?

programme.title: Uma Casa na Bruma
programme.desc: Massoud Amir Behrani é um imigrante iraniano que decide aplicar as suas finanças na aquisição de uma casa na Califórnia. Mas esta foi colocada à venda por um engano que a proprietária, Kathy Nicolo, não consegue desfazer, e as duas partes irão levar o confronto até às últimas consequências.

programme.title: Linda de Morrer
programme.desc: Na pequena cidade americana de Mount Rose, o muito aguardado concurso anual de beleza começa a gerar as maiores suspeitas quando várias concorrentes vão morrendo de forma misteriosa e se torna claro que há alguém a querer vencer a qualquer custo.

programme.title: O Jogo
programme.desc: Nicholas Van Orton, um multimilionário, acaba de completar 48 anos e o seu irmão, Conrad, oferece-lhe um cartão de uma empresa chamada Consumer Recreation Services. Esta organiza um jogo obscuro, criado à medida dos participantes, e cuja única regra é não ter regras.

programme.title: Tubarão 4 - A Vingança
programme.desc: Desta vez é pessoal. A saga "Tubarão" chega ao fim com este quarto e último filme eletrizante, no qual a esposa do xerife Brody é seguida até às Bahamas por um tubarão-branco. Como o tubarão tem como alvo a sua família, ela decide a protegê-los e destruir o monstro!

programme.title: Não Te Metas Com o Zohan
programme.desc: Lavar, secar e salvar o mundo! Zohan, um comando israelita, simula a própria morte, com o objetivo de perseguir um sonho: tornar-se o cabeleireiro mais famoso de Nova Iorque.

programme.title: Os Três Duques
programme.desc: As aventuras dos primos Bo, Luke e Daisy: os três duques. Eles e o velho tio Jesse tentam salvar a quinta da família da destruição, às mãos do comissário corrupto Boss Hogg. Para isso, contam com o "General Lee", nome de batismo do seu carro favorito, um Dodge Charger de 1969.

programme.title: Terapia Para Casais
programme.desc: Quatro casais viajam para o Hotel Eden, um paraíso numa ilha tropical e especializado em terapia de casais. Um dos casais pretende resolver os seus problemas, mas os outros só se querem divertir. Mas não demoram a descobrir que a oferta de grupo tem um preço e que todos têm de participar na terapia!

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: Um músico, "o mariachi", quer vingar a morte da sua namorada e a mutilação de uma das suas mãos. Para isso, regressa à cidade onde tudo aconteceu. Ali, conhece uma bela mulher que trabalha para um dos distribuidores de droga locais, vendo-se de novo envolvido num sangrento confronto.

programme.title: Ratazana Assassina
programme.desc: Brody é um ranger que se prepara para abrir um novo parque de campismo, com a ajuda dos sobrinhos. Tudo parece estar em ordem até que uma ratazana gigante, que sofreu uma mutação devido aos resíduos tóxicos, começar a matar tudo o que lhe aparece à frente.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga 2: Hades
programme.desc: Anos após a espetacular fuga de Ray Breslin da prisão à prova de fuga, conhecida como "O Túmulo", este organiza uma nova força de segurança de mercenários de elite.

programme.title: O Bairro da Máfia
programme.desc: Após um período no exército, onde participou na Operação Tempestade no Deserto, Tommy, o filho de um mafioso de Filadélfia, é forçado por um agente do FBI a infiltrar-se no negócio da família para provar que a máfia siciliana está a tentar dominar o tráfico de heroína nos EUA.

programme.title: K.O.
programme.desc: Antoine Lecomte, um homem frio e arrogante, é o diretor executivo de um canal televisivo. Um dia, ao despertar do estado de coma, descobre que a sua vida mudou e nada parece ser como ele recordava: mas será tudo uma realidade ou apenas um sonho?

programme.title: Bikes - Uma Aventura Sobre Rodas (V.P.)
programme.desc: Spokesville é a terra das bicicletas. Speedy, uma bicicleta de montanha, está pronta para ser líder quando o motor a gasolina chega para incomodar a cidade. Speedy e os amigos fazem tudo para vencerem a luta contra a gasolina e manter a cidade limpa.

programme.title: Silver - A Lenda do Cavalo Prateado
programme.desc: Uma mãe conta à filha uma fábula sobre o príncipe dos cavalos selvagens da Austrália, que tem de encontrar o seu lugar entre os outros equídeos e ao mesmo tempo proteger-se do homem que assumiu por missão capturá-lo e domá-lo.

programme.title: Os Tradutores
programme.desc: Nove pessoas, contratadas para traduzir o livro final de uma trilogia de grande sucesso, estão confinadas num bunker. Mas quando as primeiras páginas do manuscrito secreto aparecem online, as suspeitas recaem sobre os tradutores – e o editor fará tudo para encontrar o culpado.

programme.title: Gringo
programme.desc: Uma comédia negra recheada de ação e intriga. Esta explora a dura batalha pela sobrevivência de um homem de negócios, Harold, quando dá por ele a cruzar a linha que divide o cidadão cumpridor da lei e o criminoso procurado...

programme.title: The International - A Organização
programme.desc: Louis Salinger, agente da Interpol, e Eleanor Whitman, assistente do procurador-geral de Manhattan, querem desmascarar as atividades ilícitas de um dos bancos mais poderosos do mundo. Seguem o dinheiro de Berlim a Nova Iorque, de Milão a Istambul, e são até obrigados a contornar as leis.

programme.title: Terapia Para Casais
programme.desc: Quatro casais viajam para o Hotel Eden, um paraíso numa ilha tropical e especializado em terapia de casais. Um dos casais pretende resolver os seus problemas, mas os outros só se querem divertir. Mas não demoram a descobrir que a oferta de grupo tem um preço e que todos têm de participar na terapia!

programme.title: A Máscara de Zorro
programme.desc: Passaram mais de 20 anos desde que Don Diego de la Vega lutou com sucesso contra a opressão espanhola, com o lendário e romântico nome de Zorro. Preso durante duas décadas, tem agora de encontrar um sucessor para travar Don Rafael Montero, que regressou ao território com um louco projeto na manga.

programme.title: Le Chant du Loup - Ameaça em Alto Mar
programme.desc: Chanteraide tem o raro dom de conseguir identificar todos os sons que ouve. A bordo de um submarino nuclear francês, tudo depende dele, só que, reputado como infalível, ele acaba por cometer um erro que coloca toda a equipa em perigo de morte.

programme.title: O Enigma da Rosa
programme.desc: Uma família vê a filha mais nova ser raptada a caminho da escola e recebe uma carta do raptor a pedir um encontro antes de libertá-la. Para surpresa de todos, em vez de dinheiro, o raptor quer a confissão do segredo de um dos membros da família.

programme.title: Stallone Prisioneiro
programme.desc: Prestes a ser libertado por um crime menor que cometeu, um prisioneiro é transferido para uma prisão onde o diretor vai fazer os possíveis para que ele tenha uma vida infernal.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc:
FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"altereggo123"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow. Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
Investigação Criminal: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"household137"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Review of NCIS New Orleans","reviewBody":"As a New Orleans native I implore you and the writers to walk down any street in New Orleans and talk to a LOCAL. We DO NOT eat shrimp and grits for breakfast and praline bacon isn't in our fridge. We have worked very hard to come back from Katrina and it PAINS ME that this series (which I love and watch regularly) is making us look like uneducated loud mouth pigs. Please - come uptown and take a census of LOCALS, have a LOCAL help you with the dialect!! We DO NOT talk like that unless your're from Mississippi. PLEASE! I LOVE my city and would LOVE for the series to continue and for us New Orleanians to sound like the intelligent up and coming tech community that we are! Thank you!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16652,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-23","keywords":"usa,united states,investigation,naval officer,u.s. navy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1827376/","name":"Rob Kerkovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001634/","name":"CCH Pounder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0373192/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113138/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321782/","name":"Gary Glasberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: New Orleans: The Fourth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1485290009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Promo"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3560084, Title: NCIS: New Orleans, --- Description: NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"household137","dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Review of NCIS New Orleans","reviewBody":"As a New Orleans native I implore you and the writers to walk down any street in New Orleans and talk to a LOCAL. We DO NOT eat shrimp and grits for breakfast and praline bacon isn't in our fridge. We have worked very hard to come back from Katrina and it PAINS ME that this series (which I love and watch regularly) is making us look like uneducated loud mouth pigs. programme.desc: NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"household137"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Review of NCIS New Orleans","reviewBody":"As a New Orleans native I implore you and the writers to walk down any street in New Orleans and talk to a LOCAL. We DO NOT eat shrimp and grits for breakfast and praline bacon isn't in our fridge. We have worked very hard to come back from Katrina and it PAINS ME that this series (which I love and watch regularly) is making us look like uneducated loud mouth pigs. Please - come uptown and take a census of LOCALS, have a LOCAL help you with the dialect!! We DO NOT talk like that unless your're from Mississippi. PLEASE! I LOVE my city and would LOVE for the series to continue and for us New Orleanians to sound like the intelligent up and coming tech community that we are! Thank you!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16652,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-23","keywords":"usa,united states,investigation,naval officer,u.s. navy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1827376/","name":"Rob Kerkovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001634/","name":"CCH Pounder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0373192/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113138/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321782/","name":"Gary Glasberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: New Orleans: The Fourth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1485290009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Promo"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5","dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Dennis Smith, Terrence O'Hara, Tony Wharmby, John Peter Kousakis, James Hanlon

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olive_oil56"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A show you shouldn't miss!","reviewBody":"I have watched this show from the very beginning, and wouldn't miss a single episode for anything in the world. The cast are the best.

The writer has certainly got an unbelievable talent, and how he comes to his conclusions is just beyond me. I never miss an episode, and I tape each show, along with Law & Order, which is another great show. It shows on Saturdays and Tuesdays here in England. David Caruso, well, he's my idol, he is so sweet and shy looking, He is a brilliant actor. Each case is detailed and examined, and the results are just outstanding. C.S.I.Miami is one if my favorites I have even looked up each character on the Internet and got a better insight to them all. I hope they keep turning out more shows.

Keep it up Guys!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. The writer has certainly got an unbelievable talent, and how he comes to his conclusions is just beyond me. I never miss an episode, and I tape each show, along with Law & Order, which is another great show. It shows on Saturdays and Tuesdays here in England. David Caruso, well, he's my idol, he is so sweet and shy looking, He is a brilliant actor. Each case is detailed and examined, and the results are just outstanding. C.S.I.Miami is one if my favorites I have even looked up each character on the Internet and got a better insight to them all. I hope they keep turning out more shows.

CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. programme.title: Magnum P.I
Magnum P.I.
programme.desc:
Magnum P.I.: Created by Eric Guggenheim, Peter M. Lenkov. With Jay Hernandez, Perdita Weeks, Zachary Knighton, Stephen Hill. An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7942796/","name":"Magnum P.I.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzMGZjYjktNzNiMi00MDEyLWEyYzAtOWJmZTY1NGUyNTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYwNDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7942796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carey-941-755692"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not that Higgins is a woman, it is that she is a young woman","reviewBody":"For some reason, there are many reviewers here who are upset about Higgins being portrayed by a woman. I don't really care about Higgins being cast as a woman. What I miss is the relationship in the original show, a relationship which cannot exist in this reboot of the show.

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

Over the course of the series, we saw a grudging growth by both, each gaining respect for the other. While almost never a central element of any story, the ongoing subplot enriched the series. As well, Higgins age and experience allowed the character to be both a hero and a damsel in distress without negative impact.

In this reboot, Higgins is younger than Magnum. She is intelligent, attractive, supremely confident and competent in almost all things. By resetting the structure in this way, she becomes an antagonistic partner and an ongoing potential love interest. Moreover, if we consider Magnum a competent protagonist, she cannot bring the element of greater experience to the relationship.

The Higgins character could easily be played by by either a male or female. I suppose that casting Perdita Weeks, who plays what she is given with some skill, was to appeal to middle aged men who enjoy the scenery. Had they cast a woman 20 years older, a different older chemistry could have blossomed, one of respect, cooperation and affection. In this remake, we are stuck with another will they/won't they relationship.

This remake is unexceptional and it hardly required watching for me. Still, it had potential.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10679,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-09-24","keywords":"hawaii,private investigator,remake,former navy sea air and land force,car","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379596/","name":"Jay Hernandez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0917347/","name":"Perdita Weeks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461149/","name":"Zachary Knighton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0715350/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325865/","name":"Eric Guggenheim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. Lenkov"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi134527769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

programme.title: Battleship: Batalha Naval
programme.desc: Uma frota internacional, em exercício naval no Pacífico, é surpreendida com a súbita visão de uma nave extraterrestre que emerge do oceano. Os alienígenas depressa revelam um objetivo específico, decididos a destruir tudo o que se atravesse no seu caminho.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Investigação Criminal: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"household137"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Review of NCIS New Orleans","reviewBody":"As a New Orleans native I implore you and the writers to walk down any street in New Orleans and talk to a LOCAL. We DO NOT eat shrimp and grits for breakfast and praline bacon isn't in our fridge. We have worked very hard to come back from Katrina and it PAINS ME that this series (which I love and watch regularly) is making us look like uneducated loud mouth pigs. Please - come uptown and take a census of LOCALS, have a LOCAL help you with the dialect!! We DO NOT talk like that unless your're from Mississippi. PLEASE! I LOVE my city and would LOVE for the series to continue and for us New Orleanians to sound like the intelligent up and coming tech community that we are! Thank you!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16652,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-23","keywords":"usa,united states,investigation,naval officer,u.s. navy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1827376/","name":"Rob Kerkovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001634/","name":"CCH Pounder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0373192/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113138/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321782/","name":"Gary Glasberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: New Orleans: The Fourth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1485290009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Promo"}}</script><metacontent="

Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olive_oil56"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A show you shouldn't miss!","reviewBody":"I have watched this show from the very beginning, and wouldn't miss a single episode for anything in the world. The cast are the best.

The writer has certainly got an unbelievable talent, and how he comes to his conclusions is just beyond me. I never miss an episode, and I tape each show, along with Law & Order, which is another great show. It shows on Saturdays and Tuesdays here in England. David Caruso, well, he's my idol, he is so sweet and shy looking, He is a brilliant actor. Each case is detailed and examined, and the results are just outstanding. C.S.I.Miami is one if my favorites I have even looked up each character on the Internet and got a better insight to them all. I hope they keep turning out more shows.

Keep it up Guys!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2534388761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. programme.title: Magnum P.I
Magnum P.I.
programme.desc:
Magnum P.I.: Created by Eric Guggenheim, Peter M. Lenkov. With Jay Hernandez, Perdita Weeks, Zachary Knighton, Stephen Hill. An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7942796/","name":"Magnum P.I.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzMGZjYjktNzNiMi00MDEyLWEyYzAtOWJmZTY1NGUyNTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYwNDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7942796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carey-941-755692"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not that Higgins is a woman, it is that she is a young woman","reviewBody":"For some reason, there are many reviewers here who are upset about Higgins being portrayed by a woman. I don't really care about Higgins being cast as a woman. What I miss is the relationship in the original show, a relationship which cannot exist in this reboot of the show.

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

Over the course of the series, we saw a grudging growth by both, each gaining respect for the other. While almost never a central element of any story, the ongoing subplot enriched the series. As well, Higgins age and experience allowed the character to be both a hero and a damsel in distress without negative impact.

In this reboot, Higgins is younger than Magnum. She is intelligent, attractive, supremely confident and competent in almost all things. By resetting the structure in this way, she becomes an antagonistic partner and an ongoing potential love interest. Moreover, if we consider Magnum a competent protagonist, she cannot bring the element of greater experience to the relationship.

The Higgins character could easily be played by by either a male or female. I suppose that casting Perdita Weeks, who plays what she is given with some skill, was to appeal to middle aged men who enjoy the scenery. Had they cast a woman 20 years older, a different older chemistry could have blossomed, one of respect, cooperation and affection. In this remake, we are stuck with another will they/won't they relationship.

This remake is unexceptional and it hardly required watching for me. Still, it had potential.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10679,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-09-24","keywords":"hawaii,private investigator,remake,former navy sea air and land force,car","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379596/","name":"Jay Hernandez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0917347/","name":"Perdita Weeks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461149/","name":"Zachary Knighton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0715350/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325865/","name":"Eric Guggenheim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. Lenkov"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi134527769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7942796/","name":"Magnum P.I.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzMGZjYjktNzNiMi00MDEyLWEyYzAtOWJmZTY1NGUyNTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYwNDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7942796/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"carey-941-755692","dateCreated":"2019-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not that Higgins is a woman, it is that she is a young woman","reviewBody":"For some reason, there are many reviewers here who are upset about Higgins being portrayed by a woman. I don't really care about Higgins being cast as a woman. What I miss is the relationship in the original show, a relationship which cannot exist in this reboot of the show.

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

Over the course of the series, we saw a grudging growth by both, each gaining respect for the other. While almost never a central element of any story, the ongoing subplot enriched the series. As well, Higgins age and experience allowed the character to be both a hero and a damsel in distress without negative impact.

In this reboot, Higgins is younger than Magnum. She is intelligent, attractive, supremely confident and competent in almost all things. By resetting the structure in this way, she becomes an antagonistic partner and an ongoing potential love interest. Moreover, if we consider Magnum a competent protagonist, she cannot bring the element of greater experience to the relationship.

The Higgins character could easily be played by by either a male or female. I suppose that casting Perdita Weeks, who plays what she is given with some skill, was to appeal to middle aged men who enjoy the scenery. Had they cast a woman 20 years older, a different older chemistry could have blossomed, one of respect, cooperation and affection. In this remake, we are stuck with another will they/won't they relationship.

This remake is unexceptional and it hardly required watching for me. Still, it had potential.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10679,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-09-24","keywords":"hawaii,private investigator,remake,former navy sea air and land force,car","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379596/","name":"Jay Hernandez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0917347/","name":"Perdita Weeks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461149/","name":"Zachary Knighton"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0715350/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325865/","name":"Eric Guggenheim","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. Lenkov"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi134527769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Bryan Spicer, Eagle Egilsson, Peter Weller, Krishna Rao, Antonio Negret
